Package org.semanticweb.rulewerk.core.reasoner

Interface KnowledgeBaseListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Reasoner
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VLogReasoner
    public interface KnowledgeBaseListener
    Listener to KnowledgeBase content change events.
    Author:
    Irina Dragoste

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onStatementAdded​(Statement statementAdded)
      Event triggered whenever a new statement is added to the associated knowledge base.
      void onStatementRemoved​(Statement statementRemoved)
      Event triggered whenever a new statement is removed from the associated knowledge base.
      void onStatementsAdded​(List<Statement> statementsAdded)
      Event triggered whenever new statements are added to the associated knowledge base.
      void onStatementsRemoved​(List<Statement> statementsRemoved)
      Event triggered whenever new statements are removed from the associated knowledge base.

    • Method Detail

      • onStatementAdded

        void onStatementAdded​(Statement statementAdded)
        Event triggered whenever a new statement is added to the associated knowledge base.
        Parameters:
        statementAdded - new statement added to the knowledge base.

      • onStatementsAdded

        void onStatementsAdded​(List<Statement> statementsAdded)
        Event triggered whenever new statements are added to the associated knowledge base.
        Parameters:
        statementsAdded - a list of new statements that have been added to the knowledge base.

      • onStatementRemoved

        void onStatementRemoved​(Statement statementRemoved)
        Event triggered whenever a new statement is removed from the associated knowledge base.
        Parameters:
        statementRemoved - statement removed from the knowledge base.

      • onStatementsRemoved

        void onStatementsRemoved​(List<Statement> statementsRemoved)
        Event triggered whenever new statements are removed from the associated knowledge base.
        Parameters:
        statementsRemoved - a list of new statements that have been removed from the knowledge base.
